tasks.title: VAD-based Chunked Streaming
tasks.description: Implement VAD-based chunked streaming to solve long audio accuracy degradation (>60s).

subtasks.title: Modify DictationEngine
subtasks.description: Update DictationEngine.swift to accumulate transcriptions across VAD segments instead of processing all at once at the end.

subtasks.title: Modify WhisperKitService
subtasks.description: Update WhisperKitService.swift to support context conditioning between chunks (passing previous text/tokens).

tasks.title: Phase 4: Context Awareness
tasks.description: Implement active window context capturing to improve transcription accuracy based on what the user is doing.

subtasks.title: Active Window Context
subtasks.description: Capture window titles and bundle IDs using Accessibility APIs.

subtasks.title: Inject Context
subtasks.description: Inject captured context into WhisperKit prompt.

tasks.title: Phase 5: Polish & Ship
tasks.description: Production readiness features including onboarding and settings.

subtasks.title: Onboarding Flow
subtasks.description: Implement onboarding for Accessibility and Screen Recording permissions.

subtasks.title: Settings UI
subtasks.description: Implement Settings UI for Model selection and Mic sensitivity.
